name: Yeager
description:
Yeager is a 3D action role-playing monster hunting game set in an alien world.

Immerse yourself in the visually breathtaking world created by our next-generation graphics engine as you take on the role of Yeager, an elite Vyderan hunter who takes bounties to hunt dangerous Beasts.

Yeager features an intuitive, action-oriented combat system that allows you to choose from four powerful weapon classes — Hunting Sword, Force Hammer, Fury Blades, or Flux Blaster — to engage fearsome creatures up close, weaken them by breaking body parts with flashy combos and signature moves from your weapon class, and move in for the decisive kill.

Bring your weapon and equipment to the next level by customizing them with Beast Parts, and unlock special prefixes for bonus attributes and abilties to create the best setup for your playstyle.

Navigate your way through vast forests and winding canyons while uncovering the many secrets hidden on Ekors. But beware the monsters snapping at your heels! Pit your skills against highly challenging marks with unique movesets and attack patterns!

Enjoy realistic HD-quality Beast-hunting action and cinematics powered by physically-based rendering and motion capture technology.
